name: SolvaBall
description:
How to play:

--Your goal is to end up with the last balls in their pockets, with no other balls remaining.

--You can move each ball either by moving one tile to each available neighbor or by "eating" the adjacent ball

--Each ball has a MAXIMUM of moves to do if you get to 0 then the ball will not move.



Features:
- Over 50 challenging levels
- Special tiles to make the mechanics a little different from level to level


Feel free to contact me about every question, comment or suggestion
that you have at dima.t.apps@gmail.com.
